There is even a huge open-air swimming pool accessible from 1 p.m. to 7 p.m. for only €2 (WC available only at the pool). Accessible by car, van and even motorhome! To stay there to sleep there is also no room for 10 cars, it will be better to go to the spot 200m before.

title_short: (36629) A Pantrigueira - 61 Lugar Pantrigueira de Arriba
description: Washing of vehicles with possibility of loading water. They have a brush with two water rinsing areas inside the same box (the big one is perfect for a 6-meter van) so you can clean the windows and tires before washing under pressure. The washing pressure is excellent, waxed and very good (about 3 minutes for each euro). They are super nice and let fill with water if you wash the van. They do not have a specific emptying area for motorhomes (gray and black water), but they have a bathroom. Great place recommended before entering the island of Arousa or preparing the trip by leaving it.

Only downside, the waste and other toilet paper left on the ground, like a little everywhere unfortunately ... please, do not leave anything on the floor.

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 39 Calle Terrón
description: Fantastic spot right on edge of the beach which is dog-friendly.  There are some shady spots under trees. Very level.  We spent a fabulous night here, two or three other vans nearby.  There is a chiringuito right by beach but is quiet at night.  To access, take the dirt track directly next to the garden centre which goes down behind the Hotel Dinajan.  Go to the left of the car park which says no campervans and the track takes you under the bridge and directly to the beach.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 4 Rua 1 Lombiña
description: Ground parking with shade, very saturated on weekends, a very nice beach with beach bars and restaurants, public toilets.

title: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
title_short: (15949) A Pobra do Caramiñal - 14 Aldea Laxe
description: Private motorhome area located 400m from the beach, totally closed plot and guarded 24 hours. Electricity in pitches, toilets with hot water in showers, sinks, washing machine, barbecue area, completely flat pitches. A great place to spend a few days of relaxation and tranquility in an unbeatable environment. CHECK-IN To check-in you need ID and credit card. It is done using an automatic machine where, if the instructions are followed correctly, it is a simple process: 1. Select the number of nights you want to spend the night. 2. Choose the plot, (check size) and if you need electricity or not. 3. Scan your ID (place the document photo face up) and press READ. 4. Press pay to make the payment. 5. Make the payment with your card by passing it through the reader or entering it in the dataphone (marking your pin on it) The machine will issue you your payment ticket, ticket with information about the plot and the access card, which you have to go through the reader located at the barriers to enter. With this card you can enter and leave the area as many times as you want during your stay. RENEWAL OF STAY: If you want to renew your stay, make a check out in the machine before ending the current stay (options - checkout) Then make a new check-in.

description: 2 places end of the road at the foot of the sea

title: (36626) Isla de Arosa -
description: Parking for motorhomes and campers in a heavenly place. In this parking lot that borders the sea there is a tidal mill. Beaches and coves in the area.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: We pay 3€ to Park during the day and we where able to use the money in the bar. We spent the day.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: All in height on the view of the sea and sunset next to the meadows where there are horses and cows. Without services and take away your waste

title: (36626) - s/n Barrio as Aceñas
description: Plan between trees on the beach, touching a campsite and near a nightclub. (loud music is heard until 2 in the morning approx). The rest is perfect.

name: Camping Salinas
title: (36626) Camping Salinas
description: Camping Salinas (2 stars), but with the bare essentials. Very clean bathrooms. Friendly and pleasant welcome. Direct access to the beach. The only downside I saw is the lack of closing time for the children's area, because if you have an adjacent property and want to sleep early you will have a hard time until around 12pm. Beach bar attached to the campsite and others along the beautiful 2 km long beach walk. Barbecue area with approx. 5 places.

address.street: Playa de Xestelas, Barrio as Aceñas, s/n

title: (36616) Penaboi -
description:
Large river beach parking area. The access is very narrow (approximately 2.5m wide), so it is not recommended for AC. The place is super quiet, next to the river and surrounded by trees and lots of shade. Fit at least 10 vans. Please take care of the environment and avoid leaving rubbish.
Neighbourgs are not friendly with visitors.

name: Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
title: (36634) Área de autocaravanas Camper Cambados
description: Motorhome area in Cambados. Payment by card and phone only. Possibility of reservation subject to availability. Located in the capital of Albariño wine and just a 10-minute walk along the coastal path from the Monumental and Restoration Area of Cambados. The area is in a quiet area next to a pond with a mill and on an avenue full of services such as 24-hour supermarkets, gas stations and 24-hour laundries. Water and sewage are included in the price. There are also some pitches with electricity. The area is under video surveillance with a 24 hour recording.

title: () A Pobra do Caramiñal - CP-6705
description: View of the sea and the setting sun sinking into it. Right on a street with little traffic at least at night. Further up the road comes a nice lookout point with picnic areas.

title: (36616) Pontevedra - Unnamed road
description: Parking next to the river Umia, called Natural Space "As Aceñas", a quiet place where they enter as 8 AC. Flat, quiet parking, with a walk along the river, and about 20m there is a table to eat. It has no service, it is quite clean.

title: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
title_short: (36626) Illa de Arousa - 12 Barrio as Aceñas
description: Beautiful picnic area with incomparable scenery.

name: Camping Rural Ría de Arosa 2
title: (15993) Camping Rural Ría de Arosa 2
description: Camping very well equipped. Beautiful sanitary. Washing machine and dryer available for 6 euros each.

title: () Villanueva de Arosa - EP-9501
description: Esplanade next to the Umia River. River route departure. Easy access. Gas station, bar and bakery very close.

title: (36634) Corvillón - 2 Lugar Cabana
description: Spectacular gas station, shower service and bathrooms better than in a spa, amazing. The shower costs 4 euros for 10 minutes, the best we have ever had. In addition, the bathrooms are on the same level, impressive. Very friendly and helpful staff. You can also refuel and wash the vehicle. A 10 for those of us on the road. Service until 10:00 p.m.

title: (36659) Caldas de Reyes - 94 N-550
description: There are two low cost CRP gas stations with the cheapest fuel in many km, it also has a Merca express supermarket, it has a black and gray emptying area, it also has a washing area for AC and CAMPER, I thought I saw that they also have a parking area .Only with making a minimum expense at the gas station or supermarket, they did not charge us for emptying and filling, there is a hotel restaurant right in front of us. They treated us very kindly, I suppose something will have to do with the owner having a CAMPER.

title: (36630) Cambados - 56-58 Rúa Pombal
description: A good place to park and park if Cambados is market day or are parties because the port parking will be closed to traffic and full of stands or booths. This place is made of asphalt and compacted earth, level and with shade; since it has a grove that protects it. It is very quiet and is next to the sports center. A small bike path starts here and it is very close to Tragove tide mill

title: (36630) Cambados - 22 Avenida do Salnés
description: Day and night parking with supermarket nearby. You can walk to the center of town which has many monuments, squares and green areas to see. Do not leave the town without seeing the Fefiñanes square, the San Sadurniño tower and the Pastora mountain.

title: (36658) Paradela - 2 Rua Paradela
description: Quiet place with a fountain to recharge water with tables and benches and plenty of shade. It is next to a highway with no traffic. Difficult access for a motorhome

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Carreira
description: Laundromat near the old town.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - Unnamed Road
description: Viewpoint of Mount Enxa. Impressive dresses from the Muros and Noia estuary, nice day and night. Parking next to the Center de Comandament de Salvament Marítim de l'Atlàntic. Accés estret, recomanat només per fins vans a Jumper, Ducato, Boxer. There is no problem sleeping. Respect the environment! 2 or 3 km away is the salt d'aigua de Ribasieira.

title: (15917) Padrón - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area at the mouth of the Sar in the Ulla, ample parking for overnight, with picnic tables. Little care and a little away from the village.

title: (36630) Cambados - 28 PO-550
description: Automatic laundry

title: (36658) Caldas de Reis - 34 Rúa Estacion
description: A new area with all the services and in a pleasant space. Recommended to go with children because of the space it has. It has paddle tennis courts.

title: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 2 Rua Sardanela
description: Caldas de Reis Vehicle Housing Area, very close to the Tafona Hot Springs, and close to supermarkets and services.

title: (36630) Cambados - 8 Rúa a Pacheca
description:
Small open field very close to the beautiful Cambados Cemetery.
without services in a dead end street, very quiet to spend the night if you visit Cambados, near the center.

title: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 41 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría
title_short: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 41 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría
description: Municipal Parking (Thermal area of Tafona) with a paved part and a gravel part. Mostly flat. Next to the town center and the river where there is a stretch of river walk. There are bars nearby, a skatepark and a children's area with swings by the river. It is quiet and we sleep without noise.

title: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 26 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría
title_short: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 26 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría
description: Automatic laundry, with four washers and three dryers. Very clean and well located 200 meters from the area.

title: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
title_short: (36630) Cambados - Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
description: Several car parks but banned on Wednesday and Saturday for any market. Beautiful location and lovely town. No service.

title: (15999) Puerto del Son - 69 Pozo
description: Fountain/fonte with very good water flow right next to the road. Filling up with canisters or a watering can is no problem.

name: Camping Coroso
title: (15959) Camping Coroso
description: Camping Coroso

title: (15999) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Pozo
description: nice beach Small parking lot on the beach with trees and a nearby house. Quiet and beautiful place to spend the night. There are no services.

title: (15200) Noia - 7 Plaza San Lázaro
description: San Lazaro Square. Central but not very crowded. No parking on Thursdays and Sundays between 7 - 16 because there is a market.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 27 Lugar Cans
description: Nice beach with a place to rent kayaks and surfboards, Kapaki. Under some trees. In the morning it fills up with cars to park on the beach.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet area with picnic area. Close to the highway but with very little traffic. We did not spend the night but we could, complete tranquility!

title: (36630) Cambados - 21 Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
title_short: (36630) Cambados - 21 Rúa Alameda de San Tomé
description: Mini beach in front and a spectacular sunset and the center one step away

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Os Olmos
description: Laundry at a good price. You can't park in front but there are several car parks nearby.

title: (36636) Ribadumia -
description: There are beautiful restored mills. There is parking in the area, without services.

title: (36630) Cambados - 35 Rúa Muelle Santo Tome
description: On the port, parked along it. Quiet place, no traffic.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 30 Lugar Cans
description: Parking at Aguieira beach, large with shadows, showers, baths and a beautiful beach where kitesurfing is practiced and where there are swimmers. There is a small bar at the entrance. Night prohibited on the coast.

title: (15214) Lousame - 19 AC-308
description: Route of the Paper Mills: Beginning of the route with a recreational area with tables and stone benches, areas for grilling. Very shady with many trees. It has a source of drinking water and a river. The route starts from here. Little parking area shortly before arriving.

title: (15218) Noia - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with tables and stone benches, barbecue areas. A viewpoint towards the spectacular estuary, very shaded with many trees. It has a source of drinking water with little pressure. Little parking area only 3 fires gv or 2 ac

title: (15968) - 7 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Motorhome parking in Ribeira on the urban beach of Coroso, 1 km from the center of Ribeira, connected by a promenade and a bike path to the center of Ribeira. It has drinking water service. Natural environment in the shade of large trees a few steps from the sand of the beach. It has a beach bar (Chiringuito Quimera) where they program live music in the afternoons after the beach. Gas station just 200 meters away, also selling butane gas. We do not have gray and black water discharge. We would like to have more services but we are not allowed to do more due to the coastal location.

title: (15911) Rois - Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois
title_short: (15911) Rois - Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois
description: Campo da Festa de Rois. Next to the church of Rois. Quiet place, without services. Starting point of a beautiful hiking route along the river Rois. There is an explanatory panel. Shopping area and bars at the Antequeira crossroads, 500 meters away.

address.street: Iglesia de San Mamed de Rois

title: (15900) Padrón - Travesía Feira
description: Area with all motorhome services and a large parking lot, no places reserved for motorhomes. 200 meters from the center of the city with all services. Villa which is the birthplace of St. James, landmarks great tradition of pilgrimage and 20 km from Santiago de Compostela and served by regular public transport. A great literary culture credited to the house-museum of Rosalia de Castro and Camilo Jose Foundation Cela.Gran. Variety of local cuisine (Padron peppers, lamprey, octopus ...)

title: (15978) Aguieira - Unnamed Road
description: Aguieira beach free parking. Easily accessible and shaded trees. ideal to spend the day at the beach. access to it through a wooden walkway or crossing the shallow river.

title: (15910) Padrón - 76 Aldea Extramundi de Arriba
description: Santiaguiño do Monte recreation area. Source Castañar Barbecue Very quiet. You can go down to Padrón by the staircase along the wall of the monastery.

title: (15999) Gafa - 17 Gafa
description:
Welcome to Portosín Camper Park, our area for caravans and motorhomes located in Portosín, a town in the municipality of Porto do Son, A Coruña, in the heart of the Galician Rías Baixas.

Our area is located in a natural and quiet environment with views of the sea, ideal for disconnecting. In turn, it has all the essential services nearby (supermarkets, gas stations, pharmacies...) and an environment rich in activities, gastronomy and tourism.

It has 50 large spaces, bathrooms and showers, laundry, chill out area, black and gray water drainage, electricity, canteen-bar. Pet-friendly space.

title: (15200) Noia - 25 AC-311
description: Here you can buy Repsol bottles without formalities. 28 euros complete price 10.2022

title: (15968) Ribeira - 4 Rúa dos Estudantes
description: Car parks behind the institutes, in front of the beach at the end of the street, a quiet place, be careful to park the caravan well in the parking lines, there is a local police fine in front of you, there is also a beach bar where you can have a slush and have a quiet drink, go around the roundabout and enter along the street that is in front and continue to the left there is a sports pavilion and to the right a school follow the street and you have two esplanades to park your car.

title: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila
title_short: (15900) Padrón - 3 Rúa Porta Fondo da Vila
description: Simple city car park located 200m from a service area. Immediate proximity to the city. Many non-specific CC spaces. Convenient for going to the restaurant or shopping. Night not prohibited except market days to be verified.

title: (15200) Noia - 4 Rúa de Pedra Sartaña
description: Quiet public parking next to the free promenade. Without services Well located.

title: (36645) Raxoi - Unnamed Road
description: Waterfalls and hiking trail. Next to where you park there is a waterfall where you can swim. Access is rather for campers, narrow for AC. Access is two-way and it is better to try to go before nightfall, spend the night and enjoy the place the next day. Garbage container next to the car park.

title: (15999) A Gafa - 9 Gafa
description: It is a not very large land car park, next to a small and cozy beach with wonderful views of the estuary. It is very quiet, we slept through the night without problem, we were alone. Difficult access for AC, better vans or campers

title: (15999) Miñortos - 30 Lugar Ribeiro
description: Super beautiful beach with river and showers. There are some bars for breakfast and lunch. There is also a campsite nearby

title: (15900) Padrón - 11 Avenida Pontecesures
description: Large public car park in a meadow with trees. Very quiet location at the entrance to Padrón.

title: (15200) Noia - 9 Rúa Pintor Francisco Creo
description: Ample free parking near the center, no service.

title: (15900) Padrón - 7 Rúa Enlace Parque
description: Laundrymat

title: (15978) O Campo do Prado - 25 Lugar Aguieira
title_short: (15978) O Campo do Prado - 25 Lugar Aguieira
description: Quiet place to spend the night. To the side there is a picnic area with stone tables and plenty of shade. Playground. Near the beach of Aguieira.

title: (15900) Padrón - 27 Avenida de Compostela
description: Parking near the Padrón market where you can spend the night, it has no services but you have access to the whole town on foot. Right next to it is a park.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 10 Estrada Dean Grande
description: Free parking a few meters from the sea line. During the day it is frequented by some cars but at night it is almost deserted. Very quiet and close to Coroso beach

title: (15200) Noya - 7 Paseo Poeta Avilés de Taramancos
title_short: (15200) Noya - 7 Paseo Poeta Avilés de Taramancos
description: Self service laundry. There is a large carpark across the road. Washing machines and dryer .

title: (15999) Miñortos - 10 Lugar Ribeiro
description: Picnic area with several tables and places to cook. Located next to the beach.

title: (36637) Galicia - 29 Lugar Zacande
description: Zacande soccer field parking (Meis), quiet place to spend the night. Next to the town and the Pazo de La Saleta. Wide and easy access from the PO-300.

title: (36633) A Bouciña - Unnamed Road
description: Nice, quiet place right on the river. Surrounded by nature.

title: (15900) Padrón - 18 Rúa Dores
description: Parking clay. Nearby supermarket eroski, no service

title: (15900) Padrón - 6 Rúa Defensa do Xardín
description: Very large esplanade and next to the botanical garden. Possibility of parking motorhomes of all sizes.

name: Camping Punta Batuda
title: (15999) Camping Punta Batuda
description: Miñortos, 9 Lugar Ribeiro. Camping Punta Batuda 1 ° Category.

title: (15979) Porto do Son - Aldea Penas
description: Only off-road access, very quiet views of the Atlantic from the mountain.

title: (36633) Cambados - 106 EP-9506
description: Esplanade of land on the banks of the Umia River, picnic area on the other side of the river, 3 km from Cambados, very quiet to spend the night

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 1 Lugar Becha
description: Parking for 5 or 6 motorhomes, very quiet and on the beach.

name: Camping Cabeiro
title: (15978) Camping Cabeiro
description: Porto do Son, 21 Lugar Cabeiro. Camping Cabeiro

title: (36636) Ribadumia - Rúa Portela
description: Place to stop for something to eat, short edge but quiet.

title: (36653) Caldas de Reis - 26 Lugar Segad de Arriba
title_short: (36653) Caldas de Reis - 26 Lugar Segad de Arriba
description: Quiet and flat parking in the middle of nature, asphalted and with shade, right in front of the door of the Hydroelectric building. No house in sight. We have spent the night in silence and alone. In the morning at 9 am there may be walkers. Perfect for walking and going to the Cangas Waterfalls and its natural pools, with vineyard paths between houses. Access is good by road, but not for a very large motorhome, because there are a couple of hairpin bends. A 5 star place.

title: (15968) Ribeira - 5 Lugar Outeiro
description: Newly opened Car wash with the possibility to wash motorhomes. Has 3 place for normal cars/vans and one for trucks/motorhomes with the maximum height of 5m. Amazing new machines with really good products to wash of all the dirt with ease. Also option for hot water with soap! Prices are really good. Best in Galicia! Near future will include waste water disposal, water filling, and paying by card. Now, make sure you have coins!  Also vending machines and rest area for the family until you finish the washing ;)

title: (15979) Porto do Son - 29 Rúa Xío
description: A very nicely located parking lot on a thoroughfare south of Porto do Son, on the way to Castro de Barona (3 km), approx. 30 m above the Atlantic with a view of the sea and a wonderful sunset. Certainly not very quiet at night because of the nearby road.

title: (15210) Noia - 74 Aldea Abruñeiras
description: Parking next to the beach, with level spaces. Very quiet area, there is no movement of vehicles as it is a dead end street. Very good option for a night without discomfort.

name: Camping Os Castros
title: (15979) Camping Os Castros
description: A little oasis somewhere in the middle of nowhere. A beautiful beach including castle ruins can be reached on foot. There are two areas, one for tents and one for motorhomes. The sanitary facilities are a bit old.

title: (15999) Boa - 1 Lugar Telleira
description: Dock to spend the day or night, quiet and beautiful. Good for swimming or taking walks on the beach. Access for all types of vehicles except very large motorhomes.

title: (15993) - 13 Lugar Axeitos
description: Ample parking of the Dolmen de Axeitos. With a certain influx of visitors.

title: (15910) Padrón - Aldea Agronovo
description: We had a quiet night. Place to sleep the night from Saturday to Sunday. Since on Sundays there is a market in Padron and they cut streets and it is difficult to get around and access the AC in Padron. The only downside in the morning is the noise of cars. This is the parking lot of a playground.

title: (15978) Porto do Son - 31 Noal
description: Small platform overlooking the sea, not much room but great bivouac for 1 or 2 campers! no service.

title: (15970) Porto do Son - 30 Camiño Novo
description: Self service Laundry place. with coins. machine to change bills into coins present.

title: () Riveira - 53 Avenida Malecón
description: Very large parking in the port, perfect for visiting the town. It has no services.

title: (15998) Porto do Son - 59 Lugar Queiruga
description: Idyllic place just steps from the sea next to the pines
